Uses of Package
org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot

Packages that use org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot
org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot Pivot classes for KijiMR clients. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot.impl Implementation classes for KijiPivoter, intended for private, internal use by KijiMR. 
org.kiji.mapreduce.tools KijiMR commandline tools. 
 

Classes in org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot used by org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot
KijiCellRewriter.ConfKeys
          Configuration keys used by the cell rewriter job.
KijiCellRewriter.Counters
          Specific counters for this Map/Reduce job.
KijiPivoter
          Base class for a map-only job that reads from a Kiji table and writes to a Kiji table.
KijiPivotJobBuilder
          Builds jobs that run a KijiPivoter over a Kiji table.
 

Classes in org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot used by org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot.impl
KijiPivoter
          Base class for a map-only job that reads from a Kiji table and writes to a Kiji table.
 

Classes in org.kiji.mapreduce.pivot used by org.kiji.mapreduce.tools
KijiPivotJobBuilder
          Builds jobs that run a KijiPivoter over a Kiji table.
